content: Hi Bryce, totally agree that the ROI in case of wireframes is often unclear. In our team we do really lo-fi digital wireframing(using something like Paper by 53) and build a flows using the same lo-fi screens. A lo-fi app flow created for a client A lot of decision making happens right within this hand sketched digital flow, and then we jump right into hi-fi mockups. Happy to share more over email or a skype call.
